title: 我的世界：故事模式即将停止在各平台的下载服务
author: zyjking
txt_content:
原文地址：
https://www.minecraft.net/zh-hans/article/important-minecraft--story-mode-information




IMPORTANT MINECRAFT: STORY MODE INFORMATION有关我的世界：故事模式的重要信息
Make sure to download your episodes!确保你已经下载所有的内容
Today, we have some important information to share for all players of Minecraft: Story Mode - A Telltale Games Series, Season 1 and 2, on behalf of its publisher. As you might have heard, its publisher is no longer in business, which unfortunately means that Minecraft: Story Mode will no longer be supported. If you have purchased these seasons, please download all remaining episodes prior to the service being discontinued in June. Here’s the full message:今天，我们代表出版公司（Telltale Games），有一些关于我的世界：故事模式第一季和第二季重要的信息要告诉大家。你们可能都听说了，出版方已经不再运营，所以非常不幸的是，我的世界：故事模式将不会得到后续支持，如果你已经购买了游戏，请在六月份下载服务停止之前确保下载了所有的内容，以下是完整信息：
“On behalf of the publisher, Minecraft: Story Mode - A Telltale Games Series, Season 1 and 2 will no longer be supported on June 25th, 2019. If you have purchased these seasons, please download all remaining episodes prior to the service being discontinued in June."代表出版公司宣布，我的世界：故事模式第一季和第二季将在六月25日之后停止服务支持，如果你购买了游戏，请在六月份下载服务停止之前确保下载了所有的内容
So if you own either season of Minecraft: Story Mode on Microsoft Windows, macOS, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, PlayStation Vita, Wii U, Nintendo Switch, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Android, or iOS, you have until June 25th, 2019 to download the episodes. We’d recommend checking you have all the episodes downloaded!所以，如果你已经在Windows，macOS，PS3，PS4，PSV，Wii U，任天堂Switch，Xbox360，Xbox One，安卓和IOS等平台有着游戏，你可以在2019年六月25日之前下载游戏，我们推荐你应该检查一下是否下载完毕了！
